headline: CME Group Inc. (CME): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on CME Group Inc. on The Diversified Fins Analyst’s Substack by Collin Cook. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CME. CME Group Inc.’s share was trading at $301.64 as of February 12th. CME’s trailing and forward P/E were 27.03 and 25.58 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. CME Group Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates contract markets for the trading of futures and options on futures […]

headline: CME Group (CME) to Launch 24/7 Regulated Cryptocurrency Trading Access
summary: CME Group Inc. (NASDAQ:CME) is one of the 13 High-Quality S&P 500 Financial Stocks According to Hedge Funds. On February 19, 2026, the company announced that its regulated cryptocurrency futures and options will begin trading 24 hours a day, seven days a week from May 29 onwards, pending regulatory review. headline: The Bull Case For CME Group (CME) Could Change Following High-Profile Globex Outage On Expiry Day
summary: CME Group recently experienced technical outages on its Globex platform that halted trading in key metals and natural gas futures and options on a major contract expiry day, forcing the cancellation of several order types and disrupting clients’ ability to roll positions. These disruptions have sharpened investor focus on CME Group’s technology resilience and operational reliability just as the company is handling record open interest in U.S. Treasury contracts and expanding 24/7 crypto...
